Detailed Description

The class to provide base infomation for helping to access ContactsSettings table.

The following example demonstrates how to use this ContactsSettings class.

 getColumn(){
     String accountName    = ContactsSettings::ACCOUNT_NAME();
     String accountType    = ContactsSettings::ACCOUNT_TYPE();
 }

 getMimeType(){
     String settingsMimeType = ContactsSettings::CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE();
 }

Type: TEXT

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::ContactsSettings::CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE ( ) [static]

The MIME-type of CONTENT_URI providing a single setting.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::ContactsSettings::DATA_SET ( ) [static]

The data set within the account that this row belongs to.

This allows multiple sync adapters for the same account type to distinguish between each others' data.

This is empty by default, and is completely optional. It only needs to be populated if multiple sync adapters are entering distinct data for the same account type and account name.

Type: TEXT

Depending on the mode defined by the sync-adapter, this flag controls the top-level sync behavior for this data source.

Type: INTEGER (boolean)
